      • orderPaymentbyCheque

        @PostMapping(value="/payement/cheque")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity orderPaymentbyCheque(@RequestBody
                                                                                                           PaymentChequeDto dto)
        Pay an order using a cheque. Number of payment attempt is limited.
        Parameters:
        dto - DTO for the cheque data
        Returns:
        200 if success, 404 if order not found, 400 if invalid payment

      • orderPaymentbyCard

        @PostMapping(value="/payement/card")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity orderPaymentbyCard(@RequestBody
                                                                                                       PaymentCardDto dto)
        Pay an order using a card. Number of payment attempt is limited.
        Parameters:
        dto - DTO for the cheque data
        Returns:
        200 if success, 404 if order not found, 400 if invalid payment
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - 404: order or customer was not found
